projects.title: üê¶ Tweet Search Showcase
projects.description: Find Your Tweety is your new off-platform search engine to find the most recent Twitter Tweets by content, user timelines, hashtags, and user mentions. There's also a Tweet Surprise! page that showcases a random tweet from one of my top 5 favorite Twitter handles!

image.alt: Screenshot of Find Your Tweety search page

projects.title: üõ∏ Star Wars API
projects.description: This app uses Axios through React and Javascript to retrieve character data from the swapi.dev API and uses React-Bootstrap to for style.

image.alt: Star Wars API app page screenshot.
